article_title: Must-see morning clip: “SNL” parodies Wes Anderson, makes the most twee horror movie ever
article_text:
Topics: Must see morning clip, SNL, Video, Wes Anderson, Life News, Entertainment News, News

The “Saturday Night Live” fake trailer for Wes Anderson’s fake horror movie does a great job of mimicking the director’s distinctive style and preferred tropes (emotionless characters! obscure objects! vintage everything!), but it’s Edward Norton’s impression of Owen Wilson that is the best thing about the sketch, hands down.

Check out “The Midnight Coterie of Sinister Intruders” — just in time for Halloween!
